title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe how selective incorporation applies to this scenario.

For Task A2, the response must explain how that process impacted the Mapp v. Ohio decision.

For Task B, the response must explain how state legislatures could minimize the impact of the Courtâ€™s decision in Mapp v Ohio.

For Task C1, the response must describe how due process relates to the scenario.

For Task C2, the response must explain how changes in the membership of the Court could affect future rulings on this constitutional protection.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any five of the tasks set by the question.
